name: Key La Box
storyline:
‘Without putting up a front, I proceed to love you, the one I bare my soul to.’

‘I both love and hate you, for my heart is made up of contradictions.
Thus, I fall in love with you.’

A boy with magic hands was the one who opened the gates leading to my heart——.

A demonstration of street art taking place in the university’s campus.

And a girl who happened to be passing by. She stopped on her tracks as if a spell had been casted on her. Her gaze fell upon a boy who was painting happily, yet wholeheartedly.

Two years later——.

Her mother, who had been single since the passing of the protagonist’s father, decided to remarry. The day she was to meet her new family members, the boy from that time appears before her.

‘You are going to live together from now on.’ And so she was handed ‘the key’ to the flat where they were to live together.

This is the sudden beginning of her life under the same roof as the boy who has just become part of her family——.

A story about the key to a heart——which love mends and desire exposes.
